attributes.action: Refrain from sending an impersonal email to the petitioners who objected to the introduction of congestion charging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that our great collective number of voices was indicative of our opposition on this matter, and as such is 'non-negotiable'.
We would like to see a proper public consultation on the subject of congestion, and special attention being paid to alternatives *before* any charges are brought in.
We will not accept an impersonal email from the Prime Minister as being a valid response to our previous rejection of the idea of congestion charging.
The diplomatic process should be followed properly. Now that the Prime Minister can see his idea will face massive opposition he, and his cabinet should do something of value to establish the reasons behind our objections and investigate ways of reducing congestion which do not bring about such huge opposition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
